subject: New York City Marathon
Disabilities
Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: Tatyana McFadden fell late in the race, but regained her seat and her pace to win the women’s wheelchair title in the New York City Marathon and complete a second straight grand slam in her discipline.
snippet: Tatyana McFadden fell late in the race, but regained her seat and her pace to win the women’s wheelchair title in the New York City Marathon and complete a second straight grand slam in her discipline.
